WorkItem.Description:
Does Prism 2.2 come in VB.net as well as C++?
Where to download?
Â 
If not, any recommendations to use Prism 2.2 with VB.net environment? or do I just have to switch to C++ ?
Thanks,
Mike Sammer
WorkItem.Summary: Does Prism 2.2 come in VB.net as well as C++?

Comments.Message: There is a VB.Net for 2.2 but their is no C++ version :) .  There is a C# version.

For those using Visual Basic.NET, you can find the VB.Net version of the Prism v4 Reference Implementations, QuickStarts, and Hands-on Labs here (http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=16800).

Thanks,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
